```text
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(15.0, -70.0)

### Iron plate mine at position(x)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(5.0, -70.0)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using get_entity but no entity exists at the specified position
- Ensure that an entity of the specified type exists at the given position before attempting to retrieve it. Double-check the position and the entity type.

### Errors when attempting to craft an item whose recipe is not yet unlocked
- Before crafting an item, ensure that the required technology has been researched to unlock its recipe. Check the technology tree and research the necessary technologies first.

### Errors when attempting to craft an item with missing ingredients
- Before crafting an item, ensure that all required sub-ingredients are available in sufficient quantities. If a sub-ingredient cannot be crafted, identify the reason (e.g., missing recipe, missing ingredients) and address it accordingly. In the case of smelting, ensure the furnace has fuel.

## NAMESPACE

### Variables
- assembling_machine_position: Position
```
